optionDef.label: USB Arbitrator auto start disable
optionDef.summary: Disable automatic start of USB Arbitrator. If set USB passthrough will not be available until USB arbitrator is started at the command line.

optionDef.label: USB.devsShared
optionDef.summary: Enable sharing (aka non-exclusive claiming) of USB devices with specified vendor and model ids. 0x0 is a wild card model which matches all models from the specified vendor. The string must contain colon delimited numeric fields, respectively the vendor_id and product id. If the latter is omitted from the last pair it is assumed to be 0x0.

optionDef.label: USB.quirks
optionDef.summary: Additional USB device quirks to be added to the vmkusb native driver default quirks. Device quirks are software workarounds for hardware errata. String format is <vid>:<pid>:<low rev>:<high rev>:<quirk name>, with colon delimited fields. vid and pid are the \"usb id\" numbers for the USB device vendor and product, respectively (and e.g., 0x0e0f for vendor VMware), and low and high rev are the revisions (inclusive) between which to apply the quirk (e.g., 0 and 0xffff). Quirk name is a string constant starting with UQ_. Contact VMware support for a full list of valid quirk names.

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryPreferredDomainControllers
optionDef.summary: Preferred Domain Controllers for Active Directory

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryVerifyCAMCertificate
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable verification of SSL certificate for vSphere Authentication Proxy server

optionDef.label: Direct Console User Interface (DCUI) timeout
optionDef.summary: An idle time in seconds before DCUI is automatically logged out. Setting 0 disables the timeout.

optionDef.label: ESXiShellInteractiveTimeOut
optionDef.summary: Idle time before an interactive shell is automatically logged out (in seconds, 0 disables). Takes effect only for newly logged in sessions.

optionDef.label: ESXiShellTimeOut
optionDef.summary: Time before automatically disabling local and remote shell access (in seconds, 0 disables). Takes effect after the services are restarted.

optionDef.label: ESXiVPsAllowedCiphers
optionDef.summary: ESXi VPs allowed ciphers. List of allowed ciphers to be used by the VPs. Must be in the form accepted by the SSL_CTX_set_cipher_list API.

optionDef.label: ESXiVPsDisabledProtocols
optionDef.summary: ESXi VPs disabled protocols (Deprecated). All protocols prior to tlsv1.2 are no longer supported and must remain disabled.

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRateLimit
optionDef.summary: Set the maximum rate, in bytes/sec, for downloading VIBs (0=no limit)

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRetries
optionDef.summary: Set the number of times to retry in case of failure while downloading VIBs

optionDef.label: EsximageNetTimeout
optionDef.summary: Set the timeout in seconds for downloading VIBs (0=no timeout)

optionDef.label: Hardware Health Ignored Sensors
optionDef.summary: List of comma-seperated sensor ID's to ignore for alarm generation.

optionDef.label: Hardware Health Sync Interval
optionDef.summary: Interval in minutes for periodic synchronization of hardware sensor state with VC alarm state. Setting 0 disables synchronization.

optionDef.label: Host Client CEIP opt-in state
optionDef.summary: Whether or not to opt-in for the Customer Experience Improvement Program in Host Client, 0 for ask, 1 for yes, 2 for no

optionDef.label: Default console type when clicking on screen shot
optionDef.summary: The default console to use when clicking on a VM screen shot in Host Client, WebMKS or VMRC

optionDef.label: Show Host Client MOTD notification
optionDef.summary: Whether or not to enable MOTD notification on login for Host Client

optionDef.label: Enable Host Client Visual Effects
optionDef.summary: Whether or not to enable visual effects for Host Client

optionDef.label: Host Client session timeout
optionDef.summary: Default timeout for Host Client sessions in seconds

optionDef.label: Show recent objects in Host Client
optionDef.summary: Whether or not to show only recent objects in Host Client

optionDef.label: Welcome message displayed on login in Host Client
optionDef.summary: The welcome message that is displayed when a user logs into the Host Client

optionDef.label: HostdStatsstoreRamdiskSize
optionDef.summary: Explicitly specify size for the ramdisk hostd uses to store stats (in megabytes, 0 default). Takes effect after hostd service is restarted.

optionDef.label: ProductLockerLocation
optionDef.summary: Path to VMware Tools and vSphere Client repository

optionDef.label: SuppressCoredumpWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for disabled or unconfigured coredump target

optionDef.label: SuppressHyperthreadWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for potential security vulnerability due to hyperthreading

optionDef.label: SuppressSgxAddPackageWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for SGX disabled due to the addition of a CPU package to the host.

optionDef.label: SuppressSgxDisabledWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for SGX disabled due to Intel Errata CFW101.

optionDef.label: SuppressShellWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for enabled local and remote shell access

optionDef.label: ToolsRamdisk
optionDef.summary: Use VMware Tools repository from /tools ramdisk.

optionDef.label: CacheStatsEnable
optionDef.summary: Vitual Flash Read Cache statistics enable ?

optionDef.label: CacheStatsFromVFC
optionDef.summary: Use cache statistics from virtual Flash Read Cache module ?

optionDef.label: MaxCacheFileSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum file size (in MB) of virtual Flash Read supported

optionDef.label: MaxDiskFileSizeGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum supported disk size (in GB) with virtual Flash Read Cache configuration

optionDef.label: MaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the virtual flash heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: MaxResourceGBForVmCache
optionDef.summary: Maximum supported virtual flash resource (in GB) to be allocated for VM caches

optionDef.label: ResourceUsageThreshold
optionDef.summary: Threshold (in percentage) of virtual flash resource usage

optionDef.label: VMFS.UnresolvedVolumeLiveCheck
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable liveliness check during unresolved volume query.

optionDef.label: EnableBlockDelete
optionDef.summary: Enable VMFS block delete when UNMAP is issued from guest OS

optionDef.label: FailVolumeOpenIfAPD
optionDef.summary: Fail VMFS volume open operation if the underlying device is deemed to be under an all-paths-down condition

optionDef.label: Allow multi-writer Generation Based Locking
optionDef.summary: Enable support for more than 8 hosts using multi-writer mode locks on virtual-disks

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedLocking
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS locking (requires compliant hardware). Please see http://kb.vmware.com/kb/2094604 before disabling this option

optionDef.label: LFBCSlabSizeMax
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the VMFS affinity manager cluster cache is allowed to grow.

optionDef.label: MaxAddressableSpaceTB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size of all open files that VMFS cache will support before eviction mechanisms kick in

optionDef.label: MaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the VMFS heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: MaxextendedTxnsUsingfs3Heap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of extended transactions for which log space can be allocated from VMFS3 heap when the extendedTxnRegion is full

optionDef.label: MinAddressableSpaceTB
optionDef.summary: Minimum size of all open files that VMFS cache will support (guaranteed)

optionDef.label: OpenWithoutJournal
optionDef.summary: Open file system when out of space for journal allocation, allowing reads and no meta-data updates

optionDef.label: PBCapMissRatioIntervalSec
optionDef.summary: Frequency (in seconds) that the Capacity Miss Ratio is computed for the VMFS Pointer Block cache.

optionDef.label: StAtExclLockEnd
optionDef.summary: Generate Back Trace in FS3_EndIOExclusive

optionDef.label: Use ATS For HB On VMFS5
optionDef.summary: Use ATS for Heartbeat on ATS supported VMFS5 volumes

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.allowCoreDumpOnUsb
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable creation of core dump file on USB devices.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.atsSupport
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable PCIe Address Translation Services

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoCreateDumpFile
optionDef.summary: If enabled and if no suitable dump partition or dump file exists, create a dump file.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartition
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable auto-partitioning of empty local disks.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartitionCreateUSBCoreDumpPartition
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable auto-partitioning of core dump partition for USB boot devices. Requires that autoPartition is set to TRUE as well.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartitionDiskDumpPartitionSize
optionDef.summary: Disk dump partition size in MB that gets configured during the auto-partition process.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.bootDeviceRescanTimeout
optionDef.summary: Boot device rescan timeout (in minutes).

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.busSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different APIC timer speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.cacheFlushImmOnAllHalt
optionDef.summary: Flush caches immediately if all cores sharing LLC halt (AMD only)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkCPUIDLimit
optionDef.summary: Refuse to run on CPUID limited cpus.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkPages
optionDef.summary: Check that free and free-lpage-pool pages are not corrupted.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com1_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM1 (0 -> automatic)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com2_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM2 (0 -> automatic)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugBreak
optionDef.summary: Break into debugger during vmkernel initialization.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugLogToSerial
optionDef.summary: 0=Serial debug logging off, 1=Serial debug logging on, 2=Defer to config option DebugLogToSerial.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.deviceBindParallel
optionDef.summary: Enable parallel binding of devices across drivers in the device manager.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableACSCheck
optionDef.summary: Bypass ACS capability checks on all PCIE devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableCFOH
optionDef.summary: Disable Cache Flush on Halt

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableHwrng
optionDef.summary: Disable hardware random number generator (RDRAND, RDSEED). Overrides VMkernel.Boot.entropySources.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.diskDumpSlotSize
optionDef.summary: Disk dump slot size in MB. 0 = automatically sized, otherwise requested size >= 100 MB.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dmaEngineExposeIdentityMapping
optionDef.summary: Whether to expose whether DMA engines do identity mapping.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dmaMapperPolicy
optionDef.summary: DMA mapping policy to use.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dumpSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum core dump file size in MB. Used for automatic core dump file creation. 0 = automatically sized.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.enableACSCheckForRP
optionDef.summary: Enable ACS capability checks for Root Port

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.entropySources
optionDef.summary: Which entropy sources to enable. 0=defaults, otherwise bitmask values: 1=interrupts, 2=RDRAND, 4=RDSEED, 8=entropyd. If RDSEED is supported, the default is FIPS compliance. Otherwise the default is all entropy sources except entropyd.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.execInstalledOnly
optionDef.summary: Execute only those files that have been installed via a vib package and have not been modified.

optionDef.label: VMKernel.Boot.fakePMemPct
optionDef.summary: Amount of fake persistent memory (in pct of all volatile memory)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.forceHyperthreadingMitigation
optionDef.summary: Restrict the simultaneous use of logical processors from the same hyperthreaded core regardless of detected security vulnerabilities.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.fsCheck
optionDef.summary: Run filesystem checks on system partitions.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.gdbPort
optionDef.summary: gdb port; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapCheckTimerInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval in seconds between heap timer checks

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapFreePoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison freed memory

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetaPoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison red zones for allocations

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetadataProtect
optionDef.summary: Use poisoned red zones to protect against under/overruns

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonFreeMem
optionDef.summary: Poison free memory to catch use after free bugs

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonTimerChecks
optionDef.summary: Check heap poisoned areas for corruption on regular intervals

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.hyperthreading
optionDef.summary: Enable hyperthreading if available.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.hyperthreadingMitigation
optionDef.summary: Restrict the simultaneous use of logical processors from the same hyperthreaded core as necessary to mitigate a security vulnerability.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.hyperthreadingMitigationIntraVM
optionDef.summary: Restrict the simultaneous use of logical processors from the same hyperthreaded core as necessary to mitigate a security vulnerability within a single VM.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ignoreMsrFaults
optionDef.summary: Ignore general protection faults as a result of rdmsr and wrmsr instructions

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.inputPassthru
optionDef.summary: Pass HID input devices through to user worlds via character device

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.intrBalancingEnabled
optionDef.summary: Indicates if interrupt balancing is enabled.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ioAbilityChecks
optionDef.summary: Enforce checking of whether regions can be DMA mapped.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.iovDisableIR
optionDef.summary: Disable Interrupt Remapping in the IOMMU.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.iovEnablePostedIntr
optionDef.summary: Enable support for posted interrupts in the IOMMU.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ipmiEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable IPMI

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.isPerFileSchedModelActive
optionDef.summary: Enable per file scheduling model on this host

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.kbddev
optionDef.summary: Enable VMkernel char driver interface between host keyboard and Guest

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.leaveWakeGPEsDisabled
optionDef.summary: Disallow a wake GPE from also being a runtime GPE

optionDef.label: LogEFI Level
optionDef.summary: Log level for LogEFI.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.logPort
optionDef.summary: Serial port to enable for logging; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxLogEntries
optionDef.summary: Size of the kernel log buffer in 256-byte lines. 0=Use default. Min is 1024. Max is 32768.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUS
optionDef.summary: Number of PCPUs vmkernel should use.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUsNUMAInterleaving
optionDef.summary: Enable NUMA-node interleaving of enabled PCPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxVMs
optionDef.summary: Max number of VMs VMKernel should support. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memCheckEveryWord
optionDef.summary: Check every single word when checking mem.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memLowReservedMB
optionDef.summary: Amount of low memory (< 4 GB) which gets reserved. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxEarlyPoisonMemMB
optionDef.summary: Memory that should be poisoned during early initialization.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxPhysicalMemMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum physical memory (in MB) addressable by kernel, used to calculate the cut-off MPN, when added to the first valid memory MPN.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxRAMMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum conventional memory (RAM) supported on the system. Additional RAM above this limit will not be used by the system.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.microcodeUpdate
optionDef.summary: Update microcode from boot module if available

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.microcodeUpdateForce
optionDef.summary: Disable check that microcode update is newer than installed microcode and that both are released versions

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netCoalesceTimerHdlrPcpu
optionDef.summary: Pcpu that coalesce timeout handler runs on.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netGPHeapMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of the general purpose networking heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netMaxPktsToProcess
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of packets to process in each invocation packet processing routine

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netMaxPktsToRelease
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of packets to release in each invocation packet releasing routine

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable NetQueue support.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueEnblSwlroWithPnicHwlro
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable SWLRO for PNIC with HWLRO. Requires REBOOT.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueMaxFiltersPerUplink
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of netqueue filters for Uplink. Maximum value for this setting is 32768. Requires REBOOT.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueMaxLearnedFilters
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of hostwide netqueue learned filters. Maximum value for this setting is 16384. Requires REBOOT.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueMaxStaticFilters
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of hostwide netqueue static filters. Maximum value for this setting is 16384. Requires REBOOT.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages period for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvPerGB
optionDef.summary: Number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of low-memory packet heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 512.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMinMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Minimum MB of low-memory packet heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 512.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktPoolMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of networking packet buffer pool to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 512. Net packet pool maximum per system will be at least 656MB.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktPoolMinMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Minimum MB of networking packet buffer pool to be allocated per GB of physical memory (multiple of 24)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPreemptionEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable preemption support in overall networking area

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.nmiAction
optionDef.summary: Action on hardware generated NMI: 0=default (panic, unless changed by advanced config option), 1=enter debugger, 2=panic, 3=log and ignore (not recommended), 4=log and ignore if undiagnosed

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numSpareCoresPerLLC
optionDef.summary: Number of spare cores reserved at boot time per last-level cache (LLC)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyRemoteThresholdPct
optionDef.summary: Maximum measured memory access latency difference (in percent units) between 2 pairs of NUMA nodes for the pairs to be considered equidistant

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.overrideDuplicateImageDetection
optionDef.summary: Override duplicate ESXi image detection

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.pciBarAllocPolicy
optionDef.summary: PCI BAR allocation policy; 0=first-fit, 1=smallest-fit, 2=BAR-fit

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.pcipDisablePciErrReporting
optionDef.summary: Disable error reporting for PCI passthru devices.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonMarker
optionDef.summary: Value used to poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonPagePool
optionDef.summary: Poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.preventFreePageMapping
optionDef.summary: Prevent mapping of free pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rdmaRoceIPBasedGidGeneration
optionDef.summary: Use the new IP-based GID generation for RoCE.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rdmaUseTeamingPolicy
optionDef.summary: Use teaming policy for rdma connection.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rtcEnableEFI
optionDef.summary: Enable UEFI Runtime Services as real time clock

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rtcEnableLegacy
optionDef.summary: Enable legacy CMOS device as real time clock

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rtcEnableTAD
optionDef.summary: Enable ACPI 5.0 Time and Alarm Device as real time clock

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubIgnoredPages
optionDef.summary: Check pages that were ignored due to vmbIgnoreStartMPN and vmbIgnoreNumMPNs boot options.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubMemoryAfterModuleLoad
optionDef.summary: Check all memory after each module load. This causes booting to be very slow.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.serialUntrusted
optionDef.summary: Disable serial port if UART misbehaves.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.skipPartitioningSsds
optionDef.summary: If enabled, skip auto-partitioning of empty local SSDs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storAdptrMultCplWrldsPerNuma
optionDef.summary: Pcpu Based multiple adapter completion worlds per Numa

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMinSize
optionDef.summary: Minimum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxDevices
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxPaths
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI paths

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxVMsPerDevice
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of VMs expected to use a given device

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.swMemoryTiering
optionDef.summary: Enable Software Memory Tiering

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.terminateVMOnPDL
optionDef.summary: Terminate virtual machine on permanent loss of storage

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tscSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different TSC speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty1Port
optionDef.summary: TTY1 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty2Port
optionDef.summary: TTY2 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.updateBusIRQ
optionDef.summary: Allow adding/removing busIRQ information

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useNUMAInfo
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable NUMA-ness

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useReliableMem
optionDef.summary: System is aware of reliable memory.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useSLIT
optionDef.summary: Use NUMA latency information from the SLIT table if available

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vga
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable VGA support

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkATKeyboard
optionDef.summary: Enable VMkernel AT keyboard driver.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkacEnable
optionDef.summary: 0=Disabled, 1=Enforcing, 2=Do not enforce, just warn

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmmrEnable
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable vmmr, vmkernel monitoring of x86 host-wide and per-vm stats. 0=Disable, 1=Enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vtdSuperPages
optionDef.summary: Enable support for VT-d Super Pages (aka 2MB, 1GB large pages); super-page usage is dependent on this option as well as hardware support.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.x2ApicPreferred
optionDef.summary: Use x2APIC if available, even with less than 256 cpus.

optionDef.label: iscsiPingTimeout
optionDef.summary: Interval between ping (NOP-Out) requests, in seconds

optionDef.label: AutoRestoreDecomState
optionDef.summary: Whether to restore vSAN node decommission state automatically during vSAN refresh

optionDef.label: AutoTerminateGhostVm
optionDef.summary: Automatically terminate ghost VM(s) during network partition

optionDef.label: ClomForceProvisionPlacements
optionDef.summary: Add Force provisioning flag for all new object placement requests

optionDef.label: ClomMaxComponentSizeGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum component size used for new placements

optionDef.label: ClomMaxDiskUsageRepairComps
optionDef.summary: Percentage disk fullness after which no new repair components can be placed on a given disk

optionDef.label: ClomRebalanceThreshold
optionDef.summary: Percentage disk fullness after which rebalancing is triggered

optionDef.label: Deduplication Scope
optionDef.summary: The default deduplication scope for in all-flash disk group

optionDef.label: DefaultHostDecommissionMode
optionDef.summary: Default host decommission mode for a given node

optionDef.label: DomBriefIoTraces
optionDef.summary: Enables a brief set of per-IO DOM traces for debugging

optionDef.label: DomFullIoTraces
optionDef.summary: Enables the full set of per-IO DOM traces for debugging

optionDef.label: DomLongOpTraceMS
optionDef.summary: Trace ops that take more than the specified value in milliseconds

optionDef.label: DomLongOpUrgentTraceMS
optionDef.summary: Urgent trace ops that take more than the specified value in milliseconds

optionDef.label: MaxComponentsPerWitness
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of components for a witness host

optionDef.label: MaxWitnessClusters
optionDef.summary: Max number of clusters on a witness node

optionDef.label: ObjectScrubsPerYear
optionDef.summary: Option to set the scrubbing rate as scrubs-per-year

optionDef.label: ObjectScrubsPerYearBase
optionDef.summary: Maximum scrubs-per-year of an object for disk group utilization based scrubbing.

optionDef.label: PerTraceBandwidthLimit
optionDef.summary: Max number of traces per second (0 to disable limits)

optionDef.label: PerTraceBandwidthLimitPeriodMs
optionDef.summary: Add BANDWIDTH_LIMIT * PERIOD_MS tokens (traces) every PERIOD_MS.

optionDef.label: PerTraceMaxRolloverPeriods
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of periods where unused bandwidth can accumulate

optionDef.label: RDTChecksumMode
optionDef.summary: Checksum mode for RDT-level checksum

optionDef.label: TraceEnableCmmds
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN CMMDS and CMMDSResolver components

optionDef.label: TraceEnableDom
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN DOM component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableDomIo
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN DOMIO component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableLsom
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN LSOM component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableLsomIo
optionDef.summary: Enables IO tracing for vSAN LSOM component

optionDef.label: TraceEnablePlog
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN PLOG component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableRdt
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN RDT component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableSsdLog
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN SSDLOG component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableVirsto
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for vSAN Virsto component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableVirstoIo
optionDef.summary: Enables IO tracing for vSAN Virsto component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableVsanSparse
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VsanSparse FDS operations

optionDef.label: TraceEnableVsanSparseIO
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VsanSparse I/O operations

optionDef.label: TraceEnableVsanSparseVerbose
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for details of VsanSparse I/O operations

optionDef.label: TraceGlobalBandwidthLimit
optionDef.summary: Max number of traces per second (0 to disable limits)

optionDef.label: TraceGlobalBandwidthLimitPeriodMs
optionDef.summary: Add BANDWIDTH_LIMIT * PERIOD_MS tokens (traces) every PERIOD_MS.

optionDef.label: TraceGlobalMaxRolloverPeriods
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of periods where unused bandwidth can accumulate

optionDef.label: TracesPerErrorBandwidthLimit
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of traces per second during specific error conditions (0 to disable limits)

optionDef.label: TracesPerErrorBandwidthLimitPeriodMs
optionDef.summary: Add BANDWIDTH_LIMIT * PERIOD_MS tokens (traces) every PERIOD_MS

optionDef.label: TracesPerErrorMaxRolloverPeriods
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of periods where unused bandwidth can accumulate

optionDef.label: TrimDisksBeforeUseGranularity
optionDef.summary: Trim the devices (if supported) before using for vSAN. 0=Disable, 1=MetaData only, 2=Full Disk

optionDef.label: VsanSparseCacheOverEvict
optionDef.summary: Percentage of VsanSparseCacheThreshold to add to eviction

optionDef.label: VsanSparseCacheThreshold
optionDef.summary: Maximum VsanSparse cache size, in cache entries

optionDef.label: VsanSparseEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable auto-creation of vsanSparse instead of vmfsSparse redologs, for vSAN 2.0 datastore only.

optionDef.label: VsanSparseHeapSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum heap size for VsanSparse snapshot consolidation buffers (in KiB)

optionDef.label: VsanSparseMaxExtentsPrefetch
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of extents to fetch during interrogation

optionDef.label: VsanSparseParallelLookup
optionDef.summary: Request written extent data from each layer in parallel

optionDef.label: VsanSparseRetainCacheOnSnapshots
optionDef.summary: Try to retain VsanSparse in-memory cache content when taking VM snapshots

optionDef.label: VsanSparseRetainCacheTTL
optionDef.summary: Maximum time to retain VsanSparse in-memory cache content between snapshots, in seconds

optionDef.label: VsanSparseSpeculativePrefetch
optionDef.summary: Number of bytes to add to each extent interrogation request

optionDef.label: WriteZeroOnTrimUnsupported
optionDef.summary: Enable Writing Zero's on capacity devices that do not support TRIM

optionDef.label: allowLegacyCiphers
optionDef.summary: Allow vVOL daemon to use legacy cipher for TLS communication with VASA Provider [Warning: Non-PFS ciphers!]

optionDef.label: vvolConcurrentBatchUnbind
optionDef.summary: Number of concurrent batch unbind requests

optionDef.label: vvolMaxRBZRetries
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of times RBZ is retried during Rebind

optionDef.label: vvolSpaceStatsCacheSize
optionDef.summary: Size of the swap VVOL cache in (must be <= 1024) VVOLD

optionDef.label: vvolSwapFilePersist
optionDef.summary: Disable deletion of swap file on vVol datastore when the VM powers off (1 to disable).

optionDef.label: vvolUnbindBatchSize
optionDef.summary: Batch size for the Batch unbinding for VVOLs

optionDef.label: Virsto Disk Format version
optionDef.summary: Virsto Disk Format version

optionDef.label: Enabled
optionDef.summary: Use Virsto format for new disks

optionDef.label: Flusher Registry space threshold
optionDef.summary: Flusher registry data size threshold (percentage) when metadata flush is forced

optionDef.label: Control GWE on-disk extents fetching
optionDef.summary: Multiplier controlling how many on-disk extents fetched based on GWE request size

optionDef.label: Instance heap limit
optionDef.summary: Heap limit for each Virsto instance (disk) in MB

optionDef.label: Map block cache flush threshold
optionDef.summary: A threshold for dirty entries of map block cache when metadata flush is forced (in count of 4KB blocks)

optionDef.label: Map block cache minimum
optionDef.summary: Map block cache minimum for each Virsto instance (in count of 4KB blocks)

optionDef.label: Virsto MF retry count
optionDef.summary: How many times Virsto metadata flusher retries in case of a transient error.

optionDef.label: Msec before metadata flush
optionDef.summary: Force Virsto metadata flush after this many msec

optionDef.label: Records per format write
optionDef.summary: Number of (LSAR) records written per format write operation

optionDef.label: Shared heap limit
optionDef.summary: Shared heap limit for Virsto module in MB

optionDef.label: VMFSOptimizations
optionDef.summary: Enable VMFS-specific IO optimizations
